titleStmt.title: Recusants conversion a sermon preached at St. James, before the Prince on the 25. of Februarie. 1608. By Daniell Price Master of Arts, of Exeter Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Price, Daniel, 1581-1631.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
